EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: NATIONAL SECURITY AND INTELLIGENCE REVIEW AGENCY ACT

Identification.LongTitle: National Security and Intelligence Review Agency Act Deputy Heads of the Federal Public Administration Order

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, under paragraph (e) of the definition deputy head in section 2 of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency Acta and paragraph 55(b) of that Act, makes the annexed National Security and Intelligence Review Agency Act Deputy Heads of the Federal Public Administration Order.

Section.Text: The person holding the position set out in column 2 of the schedule is designated, for the purposes of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency Act, as the deputy head of that corresponding portion of the federal public administration set out in column 1.
The Canadian Security Intelligence Service Act Deputy Heads of the Public Service of Canada Order1 is repealed.
This Order comes into force on October 15, 2024, but if it is made after that day, it comes into force on the day on which it is made.
